code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{authService}from'../../services/authService';import{useParams}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const EmailVerification=()=>{const{token}=useParams();const[message,setMessage]=useState('');useEffect(()=>{const verifyEmail=async()=>{try{await authService.verifyEmail(token);setMessage('Email verified successfully');}catch(err){setMessage('Verification failed');}};verifyEmail();},[token]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:message});};export default EmailVerification;
